perfil.entrada: Incident Manager & Junior Full Stack Development
perfil.cuerpo: My extensive background in administration is coupled with my enthusiasm for development, marking my entry into the world of web development. As a junior full stack professional, I am committed to continuous learning and constant improvement. My versatile approach allows me to tackle challenges from different angles, whether it's resolving critical incidents or crafting innovative solutions. This portfolio reflects my journey and projects, signaling the beginning of my venture into the fascinating realm of development. I am excited to share my experience and contribute to the growth and success of future projects. Welcome!
